        public void btnQualityClicked()

      • btnDeleteAccountClicked

        public void btnDeleteAccountClicked​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        The delete button has been clicked. A confirmation is asked and if the user still wants to go on, the system proceeds by logging out the user and erasing all its data.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
